message.entry: {0} and {1} data must have the same number of samples (rows).
Estimate orientation from magnetometer and accelerometer readings.
The block estimates orientation that can rotate quantities from a global coordinate system to sensor body coordinate system.

Select the Reference frame as 'NED' or 'ENU' to specify the reference frame of the orientation output as North-East-Down or East-North-Up respectively. Select the Orientation format as 'quaternion' or 'Rotation matrix' to get the orientation as an N-by-4 quaternion element or a 3-by-3-by-N rotation matrix, respectively.
